document_data.name: Kolbaz
document_data.mainbody: '''Kolbaz''' was an old and cantankerous mage and a member of the [[Harpers]] in [[Yartar]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Kolbaz lived in a villa owned by the Harpers in Yartar. His duty was to protect one of ''[[teleportation circle]]s'' of [[Krowen Valharrow]]'s network. He always cast a ''[[hallucinatory terrain]]'' spell in order to frighten away strangers.
